question_stem_html:
Consider the following SAS program:

DATA ex_1;
INPUT subject gender $ CA1 CA2 HW $;
DATALINES;
10 m 80 84 a
7 m 85 89 a
;

The $ indicates that CA1 is to be read in as a numeric variable.

items.part_stem_html:
Consider the following SAS program:

DATA ex_1;
INPUT subject gender $ CA1 CA2 HW $;
DATALINES;
10 m 80 84 a
7 m 85 89 a
;

The $ indicates that CA1 is to be read in as a numeric variable.
items.solution: The dollar sign corresponds to the variable *before* it. In this case, the statement indicates that gender should be read in as a character variable.
items.solution_html: The dollar sign corresponds to the variable *before* it. In this case, the statement indicates that gender should be read in as a character variable.
